dn11:11.1: sīlasampanno, indriyesu guttadvāro → bhojane mattaññū (bj, mr)
dn11:13.3: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ → pisuṇāvācaṁ (pts1ed) | samaggarato → samaggarāmo (bj) | anuppadātā → anuppādātā (pts1ed)
dn11:20.2: nāḷikaṁ asiṁ → khaggaṁ (bj, pts1ed); asiṁ khaggaṁ (sya-all, km); khaggaṁ asiṁ (mr)
dn11:21.2: janapadakathaṁ itthikathaṁ → itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts1ed); itthīkathaṁ purisakathaṁ (sya2ed); itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ kumārakathaṁ kumārikathaṁ (mr)
dn11:38.3: byantiṁ kareyya → byantīkareyya (bj, sya-all, km); vyantikareyya (pts1ed)
dn11:39.5: na ca me → nacassa me (bj, mr)
dn11:49.1: paripphuṭāni → paripphaṭāni (sya-all); paripphuṭṭhāni (pts1ed) | nāssa → nassā (bj) | parisannāni → abhisannāni (sya1ed, sya2ed); abhisandāni parisandāni (mr)
dn11:52.1: So → puna caparaṁ mahārāja bhikkhu so (bj, mr)
dn11:53.2: pītaṁ vā lohitaṁ vā → pītakaṁ vā lohitakaṁ vā (mr)
dn11:55.1: īsikaṁ → isikaṁ (bj, sya-all); isīkaṁ (pts1ed) | Seyyathā → seyyathāpi (bj, pts1ed) | pavāheyya → pabbāheyya (sya-all, mr)
dn11:55.3: pavāḷhā’ti → pavālhāti (bj); pabbāḷhāti (cck, sya1ed, mr); pabāḷhāti (sya2ed)
dn11:65.1: rathikāyapi vīthiṁ sañcarante → rathiyā vītisañcarantenapi (bj); rathiyāya vithiṁ sañcarantepi (sya-all); rathiyā vīthi sañcarantepi (pts1ed)
dn11:85.5: tathāgatakova → tathā pakkantova (cck); tathāpakkanto va (sya1ed, sya2ed)
